name: Video_with_player_UI
author: Gert-Jan Akerboom
description: Renders a video surface with world-space Play, Pause, and Reset UI buttons that players can click to control playback. Syncs video state across multiplayer via client-server messaging, supports looping, configurable dimensions, volume, and fit modes.
